Clipboard.asText

機能/意味
Text format
タイプ
Clipboardクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Represents the textual data currently on the clipboard. You can also write a value.
　Reading the value gives you the textual data currently on the clipboard. If there is no textual data on the clipboard, void is returned.
　By writing the value, you can store the data in text format on the clipboard.
